participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Curious and caring, Emma enjoys learning and spending time with friends.
participant_1.background: I'm going to watch some Jacob Sartorius music videos on YouTube and study for my upcoming exams. I want to be reincarnated as a cat so I can spend my days lazing around in the sun and chasing mice. I do not have kids, but I love taking my friends to local coffee shops and bookstores. I like to read pet training blogs and websites. I have a ten year old son.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and reflective, Sophia strives to balance family life and personal interests.
participant_2.background: I wash my clothes when I have to. I sometimes think I am too busy to keep up with my family, but I try my best because I love them. I'm afraid of not being able to protect my son from harm. I'd love to show off my gummy worm collection to my friends if I was famous. I am an average weight, but I am not happy with it.

content.text: Hi I'm a student, I like to read pet training blogs and websites.
Hi I'm a stay at home mom, I sometimes think I am too busy to keep up with my family but I try my best because I love them.
What's your favorite thing about being a stay at home mom?
I love spending time with my son.
Aww, that sounds so sweet. What do you do with him?
We play games, go to the park, and I read him stories.
That's so cute. What kind of games do you play?
We play board games, card games, and we also play outside.
That sounds like so much fun. I wish I had a kid to play with.
You can always volunteer at your local child care center or homeless shelter.
That's a great idea, I'll look into that.
I'm sure you'll be great with kids
